sentence.Network_en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

sentence.Network_en: Rather taken aback by such forwardness, I slammed down the phone.
sentence.Network_cn: 如此无礼的言语让我火冒三丈，我砰的一下把电话挂了。

sentence.Network_en: Fraud squad officers had bugged the phone and were ready to pounce.
sentence.Network_cn: 反诈骗小组的警员们已在电话上安装了窃听器，并随时准备突击。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek phōnē 'sound, voice'

encyclopedia.content: 一、名词n. 1.电话。 She spoke to me by phone last night. 她昨晚与我通了电话。 2.电话机。 The phone is ringing. 电话在响。 3.听筒，耳机。 二、及物动词vt. 1.打电话给。..[(+up)] I must phone her up tonight. 我必须今夜跟她打电话。 I went back to the motel to phone Jane. 我回到汽车旅馆给简打电话。 2.打电话告知[+that] He phoned me to come at once. 他打电话要我马上来。 He phoned me the good news. 他打电

entry.def: The phone is an electrical system that you use to talk to someone else in another place, by dialling a number on a piece of equipment and speaking into it.

example.ex: You can buy insurance over the phone...
example.tran: 你可以通过电话购买保险。

example.ex: She looked forward to talking to her daughter by phone...
example.tran: 她盼望着能打电话和女儿交谈。

entry.def: The phone is the piece of equipment that you use when you dial someone's phone number and talk to them.

example.ex: Two minutes later the phone rang...
Doug's 14-year-old son Jamie answered the phone.
example.tran: 道格14岁的儿子杰米接了电话。

entry.def: If you say that someone picks up or puts down the phone, you mean that they lift or replace the receiver.

example.ex: She picked up the phone, and began to dial Maurice Campbell's number...
example.tran: 她拿起电话听筒，开始拨打莫里斯·坎贝尔的号码。

example.ex: Trembling, she put the phone down. It rang again almost immediately.
example.tran: 她颤抖着放下电话听筒，电话几乎立刻又响了起来。

entry.def: When you phone someone, you dial their phone number and speak to them by phone.

example.ex: He'd phoned Laura to see if she was better...
example.tran: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

example.ex: I got more and more angry as I waited for her to phone.
example.tran: 我等她电话的时候，越等越生气。

entry.def: If you say that someone is on the phone, you mean that they are speaking to someone else by phone.

example.ex: She's always on the phone, wanting to know what I've been up to.
example.tran: 她老来电话，想知道我在做什么。

entry.tran: 装了电话的；可用电话联系的
entry.def: If you are on the phone, you have a phone in your home or place of work, so that you can be contacted by phone.

example.ex: The Frosts were not on the phone.

means.word_mean: 1. electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds;

sentences.sentence: "I talked to him on the telephone"

means.word_mean: 2. (phonetics) an individual sound unit of speech without concern as to whether or not it is a phoneme of some language
3. electro-acoustic transducer for converting electric signals into sounds; it is held over or inserted into the ear;

sentences.sentence: "it was not the typing but the earphones that she disliked"

means.word_mean: 1. get or try to get into communication (with someone) by telephone;

sentences.sentence: "I tried to call you all night"
"Take two aspirin and call me in the morning"

slang.tokens: talk on the big white phone

example.en: One more beer and I'm gonna have to go talk on the big white phone.
example.zh: 再多喝一杯啤酒，我就非要跑到洗手间去呕吐不可怜。

auth_sentence.content: My phone rang as summer gave way to autumn.
auth_sentence.res_content: My phone rang as summer gave way to autumn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My phone rang as summer gave way to autumn.

auth_sentence.content: When the mobile phone arrived on the front line.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the mobile phone arrived on the front line.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the mobile phone arrived on the front line.

auth_sentence.content: So was there going to be a mobile phone?
auth_sentence.res_content: So was there going to be a mobile phone?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So was there going to be a mobile phone?

Sentence.sentence: I need to go make a quick phone call.
And the phone hasn't stopped ringing
Paul, tell me about the special project you mentioned on the phone.

sentences.en: If you have no other business, you may hang up the phone.
sentences.cn: 如果你没有其他事, 你就可以挂机了。

sentences.en: We must phone for a doctor at once.
sentences.cn: 我们必须马上打电话请医生。

sentences.en: Mary phoned that her son was lost.
sentences.cn: 玛丽打电话来说她儿子失踪了。

sentences.en: She phoned me that she was leaving by the first train.
sentences.cn: 她打电话告诉我说她要乘首班车走。

jushi.english: Someone waited for you on the phone.
If you have no other business, you may hang up the phone.
jushi.chinese: 如果你没有其他事,你就可以挂机了。

jushi.english: She is waiting to answer the phone.
